text: Tequixquiac is a municipality in the state of México in Mexico. The population of the municipality is 39,489 people. The seat of the municipality is Santiago Tequixquiac. The municipality was formed in 1818. ==Government== Mayor Period José Rafael Pérez Martínez 2000-2003 Gustavo Alonso Donis 2003-2006 Enrique Martinez Astorga 2006-2009 Xóchitl Ramirez Ramírez 2009-2012 Juan Carlos González 2013-2015 Salvador Raúl Vázquez 2015-2018 Gilberto Ramírez Domínguez 2019-2021 Luis Raúl Meneses García 2022-2024 == Demography == Settlements Population Total Municipality 39,489.Municipality of Tequixquiac SEDESOL, catálogo de localidades. Archived from the original on May 8, 2016. Santiago Tequixquiac 19,772 Tlapanaloya 6,294 San Miguel 2,754 Colonia Wenceslao Labra 1,248 Palo Grande 223 La Heredad 73 ==References== ==Other websites==
title: Tequixquiac Municipality
